name: Sell patents
text: Discard X card to gain X M€

name: Power plant
text: For 11 M€ you get to increase your energy production 1 step

name: Asteroid
text: For 14 M€ you get to increase temperature 1 step (and your TR)

name: Aquifer
text: For 18 M€ you get to place an ocean tile (you also get 1 TR and collect any placement bonus for the tile)

name: Greenery
text: For 23 M€ you get to place a greenery tile, which increases oxygen level (and your TR) 1 step, and collect any placement bonus for the tile. Put a player marker on the tile

name: City
text: For 25 M€ you get to place a city tile (collect any placement bonus for the tile, and place a player marker on it). You also get to increase your M€ production 1 step.

name: Buffer Gas
text: For 16 M€ you get to increase your TR 1 step

name: Terraformer
text: Having a terraform rating of at least 35

name: Mayor
text: Owning at least 3 city tiles

name: Gardener
text: Owning at least 3 greenery tiles

name: Builder
text: Having at least 8 building tags in play

name: Planner
text: Having at least 16 cards in your hand when you claim this milestone

name: Landlord
text: Owning the most tiles in play.

name: Banker
text: Having the highest M€ production.

name: Scientist
text: Having the most science tags in play.

name: Thermalist
text: Having the most heat resource cubes.

name: Miner
text: Having the most steel and titanium resource cubes.

name: DIVERSIFIER
text: Requires that you have 8 different tags in play

name: TACTICIAN
text: Requires that you have 5 cards with requirements in play

name: POLAR EXPLORER
text: Requires that you have 3 tiles on the two bottom rows

name: ENERGIZER
text: Requires that you have 6 energy production

name: RIM SETTLER
text: Requires that you have 3 jovian tags

name: Cultivator
text: Owning the most greenery tiles

name: Magnate
text: Having most automated cards in play (green cards)

name: Space Baron
text: Having the most space tags (event cards do not count)

name: Eccentric
text: Having the most resources on cards

name: Contractor
text: Having the most building tags (event cards do not count)

name: GENERALIST
text: Requires that you have increased all 6 productions by at least 1 step (starting production from corporation cards count as increase).

name: SPECIALIST
text: Requires that you have at least 10 in production of any resource.

name: ECOLOGIST
text: Requires that you have 4 bio tags (plant-, microbe- and animal tags count as bio tags).

name: TYCOON
text: Requires that you have 15 project cards in play (blue and green cards).

name: LEGEND
text: Requires 5 played events (red cards).

name: Celebrity
text: Having most cards in play (not events) with a cost of at least 20 megacredits.

name: Industrialist
text: Having most steel and energy resources.

name: Desert Settler
text: Owning most tiles south of the equator (the four bottom rows).

name: Estate Dealer
text: Owning most tiles adjacent to ocean tiles.

name: Benefactor
text: Having highest terraform rating. Count this award first!

name: AGRONOMIST
text: Requires that you have 4 plant tags

name: ENGINEER
text: Requires that you have at least 10 in production of energy and heat combined

name: SPACEFARER
text: Requires that you have 4 space tags

name: GEOLOGIST
text: Requires that you have 3 tiles on, or adjacent to, volcanic areas

name: FARMER
text: Requires to have 5 animal and microbe resources combined

name: Traveller
text: Having most Jovian and Earth tags.

name: Landscaper
text: Owning most connected tiles (player's largest group of tiles).

name: Highlander
text: Owning most tiles not adjacent to ocean.

name: Promoter
text: Having most event cards played.

name: Blacksmith
text: Having highest production of steel and titanium combined.
